casebody.data:
John ALBARELLI et al., Plaintiffs-Appellants, v. HARRISON MOTOR FREIGHT, Inc., et al., Defendants-Appellees. No. 175, Docket 23717. United States Court of Appeals Second Circuit. Argued Jan. 9, 1956. Decided Jan. 9, 1956. David R. Lessler, Bridgeport, Conn., for appellants. Gregory C. Willis, Bridgeport, Conn., for appellees.

Before CLARK, Chief Judge, and FRANK and LUMBARD, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed in open court on Judge Anderson’s memorandum refusing to set aside a verdict for the defendant.
